flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
My name is Nishan Pilibosian, my cousin Tim Case and I are a couple of gadget nuts that feed off of innovation, which fuels our love for new technology and products that change our way of living. In our fleeting moments, we’re a couple of Chicago boys that love to grill and enjoy firing up some quality pizzas, and it was actually in those moments that we sparked a flame.

We developed a product that innovates the at home pizza making process. The Brick Oven Box transforms your gas grill into a brick oven/deck oven/convection oven that produces Neapolitan-style pizza in around 90 seconds and pizzeria quality pies in 3-6 minutes, like a wood-fired oven you would find at a high-end pizza restaurant.
